content: We've got $100K worth of prizes with your name on themSummer is the season of thrilling adventures, and Sherbet is adding an extra dash of excitement with our Sherbet Summer Splash - a month-long promotional event set to sizzle this June. In the spirit of fun, excitement, and generosity, we're giving away a staggering $100,000 worth of prizes daily.Get ready to dip into our pool of rewards because your chances of winning have never been better. Alongside hefty cash prizes, NFTs, and bonus drops, we're also offering an all-expenses-paid trip to the dazzling lights of Las Vegas!How do I participate?Every day in June, a new challenge, giveaway, or event will activate across our social channels - each with its own rules and criteria. Follow us on Twitter, join our Discord, and get active on Sherbet.com to ensure you don't miss a thing.We're offering extra chances to win for those who rep Sherbet more than most. You can boost your odds by updating your Twitter and Discord avatar with an owned Sherbet NFT or one of our ready-made avatars. An owned Sherbet NFT as your avatar will increase your chances of winning by 2.5x, while using one of our ready-made avatars will bump your odds by 1.5x. It's a fun and simple way to express your Sherbet spirit while increasing your chances of walking away with a big win.Sherbet Summer Splash is not just about the incredible prizes. It's a celebration of the Sherbet community; a thank you to our players, and a warm welcome to newcomers.Hold on to your sunhats; it's going to be a thrilling ride!
